fields.headline: Spicer slings dreadful Hitler analogy
fields.bodyText: Trying to underscore the seriousness of chemical weapons used in Syria, Sean Spicer said Adolf Hitler “didn’t even sink to using chemical weapons”. The Nazis employed gas chambers widely in the course of murdering more than 6 million Jews and others. Spicer faces backlash The press secretary tried three times to clarify his remarks. At first, he said Hitler was “not using the gas on his own people in the same way that Assad is doing”, eliding German deaths in the Holocaust. The Anne Frank Center and others called on the Trump administration to bench Spicer after the incident. The Holocaust Museum tweeted footage of Buchenwald. Democrats pointed to the Trump team’s past flirtations with Holocaust denial.
